tool_description: API shows climate change around the world.
name: Weather Change Live
title: Weather Change Live

api_list.name: Get specific weather report
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
